articles.author: Silvia Amaro
articles.title: UK cuts its quarantine policy to five days — but there’s a catch - CNBC
articles.description: Travellers arriving in the UK will be able to cut their self-isolation period from 14 to 5 days starting next month if they test negative for the coronavirus.
articles.content:
Passengers arrive at Gatwick Airport, U.K.
